tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE foot_traffic_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    customer_behavior VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE store_entrances (
  entrance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  store_id INT,
  entrance_name VARCHAR(50),
  entrance_location POINT,
  entrance_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  store_id INT,
  entrance_id INT,
  customer_type VARCHAR(50),
  behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
  behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  store_id INT,
  entrance_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_value DOUBLE PRECISION,
  sensor_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE foot_traffic_data (
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    store_id INT,
    foot_traffic_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior_data (
    customer_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(255),
    duration_seconds INT,
    store_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE activity_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_id INT,
  customer_id INT
);
